price: 68. Y si discuten contigo, diles: “Al-lah sabe bien lo que hacen.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
